documentation.text:
Calculate the available income
@return available income that has not been minted yet.*

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)

documentation.text:
Refresh the cumulative rates and debts of all vaults and all collateral types.
@dev anyone can call this.*

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)

documentation.text:
Initialize the cumulative rates to 1 for a new collateral type.
@param _collateralType the address of the new collateral type to be initialized*

attributes.text:
Calculate the available income
@return available income that has not been minted yet.*

Refresh the cumulative rates and debts of all vaults and all collateral types.
@dev anyone can call this.*

attributes.type: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IConfigProvider.CollateralConfig memory)

attributes.text:
Initialize the cumulative rates to 1 for a new collateral type.
@param _collateralType the address of the new collateral type to be initialized*

returns._0: available income that has not been minted yet.*

params._collateralType: the address of the new collateral type to be initialized*

refreshCollateral(address).details: this updates the debt for all vaults with the specified collateral type.

params._collateralType: the address of the collateral type to be refreshed.*

syncState(address).details: This call will read the state via `cumulativeRates(address collateralType)` and `lastRefresh(address collateralType)`.

params._stateAddress: address from which the state is to be copied.*

syncStateFromV1(address).details: This call will read the state via `cumulativeRates(address collateralType)` and `lastRefresh(address collateralType)`.

params._core: address of core v1 from which the state is to be copied.*

initializeRates(address).notice: Initialize the cumulative rates to 1 for a new collateral type.

refresh().notice: Refresh the cumulative rates and debts of all vaults and all collateral types.

refreshCollateral(address).notice: Refresh the cumulative rate of a collateraltype.

syncState(address).notice: Sync state with another instance. This is used during version upgrade to keep V2 in sync with V2.

syncStateFromV1(address).notice: Sync state with v1 core. This is used during version upgrade to keep V2 in sync with V1.
